title: Rebel
description: Sterling Falls is a dark, gothic reverse harem romance series with enemies to lovers, romantic suspense, and new adult themes. Rebel is book 3 in the series and a continuation of the first two - it is not a standalone.Warning: the blurb contains spoilers for the previous books in the series.––War has come to Sterling Falls.The guys and I are scattered. Finding them is the first step.Freeing them of their chains is the next.Labeled a fugitive, I’m hunted for a rebellion I haven’t even begun to lead.But I will lead it. I fell in love with this city–I won’t let it fall into chaos so easily.A calm facade blankets the city.Underneath it, the gangs are at each others’ throats.Not everyone is glad I’m back in Sterling Falls…And some would kill to keep me out.
author: S. Massery
